author: John Haltiwanger and Sonam Sheth
title: Trump says 'nobody' could've predicted a pandemic like coronavirus. Here are all the times he was warned about it and refused to take action.
description: President Donald Trump has frequently insisted that "nobody" could have seen the coronavirus outbreak coming and that it "came out of nowhere." The pandemic's scope and severity are unlike anything the global community has grappled with in decades. But the pr…
content:
"What a problem," President Donald Trump said on March 6. "Came out of nowhere."
He was referring to the rapid spread of the novel coronavirus, which the World Health Organization declared a pandemic five days later.
"I would view it as is something that ju… [+5817 chars]
